episodes.title: Ex-Cult Members Unmask the Lies | Secrets Revealed
episodes.description:
In partnership with Unlikely Collaborators and inspired by Perception Box Questions, we invite participants to explore vulnerability and unpack the stories that shape self-understanding. Explore the Perception Box framework and how it influences your life at https://www.unlikelycollaborators.com or check out ‪‪@unlikelycollaborators

episodes.title: Do All Ex-Cult Members Think The Same? | Spectrum
episodes.description:
New episode of our podcast, Radical Empathy: 👉 https://anchor.fm/radicalempathy 👈 In this episode of the podcast, we talk to Calvin, an former Mormon fundamentalist, about his experiences. Listen now!
